item.title: Should you care about LEDs usage? Consequences of using them
item.description: Should you care about LEDs usage? Have you ever wondered if you should start using LED lights? And you’ve never found the time to find out if they’re really worth it. Let me show a couple of examples of the consequences of using LED bulbs or lights in your projects, home or even vehicles. What a LED light really is A light-emitting diode or LED, is a light source consisting of a semiconductor material with two terminals.
